statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';

SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 2 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id < 5;
SELECT customer_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(purchase_history->'purchases') as purchase FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase DESC;

SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT c.name, p.amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 1000 ORDER BY p.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date FROM campaign_history ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
